description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6mubn","text":"This protocol describe the procedures used to clean a coverglass surface and perform ThT detection of protein aggregates in CSF (SAVE imaging) on a TIRF microscope. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"54ql8","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hn74","text":"Diener Electronic ZeptoOne Plasma Cleaner","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm5rm","text":"Oxford Nanoimager","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e3b8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eskvg","text":"Consumables:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hu6k","text":"Coverslips (Merck, C9056-1CS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pccp","text":"0.02-micron syringe filters (Merck, WHA68092002)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2snd","text":"Frame-Seal slide chambers (9 × 9 mm2, Biorad, Hercules, CA, SLF-0601).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":35,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d3h3","text":"Eppendorf Protein LoBind tubes (Merck, EP0030108094)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rnn8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hvef","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8si6","text":"Phosphate buffered saline (Merck, P4417)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fce1h","text":"Thioflavin T (Merck, 596200-500MG)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9qvg","text":"Ethanol (Sigma-Aldrich, 459836)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eroq2","text":"Poly-l-lysine (70 000–150 000 molecular weight, Sigma-Aldrich, P4707-50 ML)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an7ci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d5m6l","text":"Add 70 uL of PLL to each chamber and incubate for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7fkm","text":"Prepare approx. 4 mM stock of ThT in 100% ethanol and vortex extensively (approx. 1 hour).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnnqb","text":"Prepare approx. 200 uM ThT dilution in PBS, vortex thoroughly (approx. 20 mins) and filter through 0.02-micron filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"oi62","text":"Measure concentration of ThT preparation using a DeNovix spectrophotometer (extinction coefficient 36,000 M-1 cm-1 at 412 nm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":107,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":112,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3cn23","text":"Prepare a 50 uM working stock in 0.02-micron filtered PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9c7iu","text":"Add 5 uL CSF, 5 uL ThT working stock, and 40 uL PBS to an eppendorf tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8688","text":"Add 50 uL of the sample prepared in the previous step to the PLL-treated coverslips, and incubate for 1h. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"369sc","text":"Add 100 uL of 5 uM ThT to the coverslip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6r92t","text":"Acquire an 8 x 8 grid of 200-micron spaced fields of view per well by total internal reflection fluorescence microscopy using the ONI Nanoimager with 100x/1.4 oil immersion objective lens. Samples are excited at 405 nm, 50 frames captured per field in each channel at 20 frames s-1. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":279,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: SAVE imaging of protein aggregates in cerebrospinal fluid
title_html: SAVE imaging of protein aggregates in cerebrospinal fluid
